body.title: Get Started with OpenObserve
body.description: Choose the deployment option that best fits your needs and start monitoring your infrastructure and applications today.

items.title: OpenObserve Cloud
items.description: Get started in minutes with our fully managed cloud solution. No infrastructure to manage.
features: Scalable resources based on your needs

items.label: Quick Start
items.title: Quick Start Installation
items.description:
Docker

docker run -d \ --name openobserve \ -p 5080:5080 \ -e ZO_ROOT_USER_EMAIL=root@example.com \ -e ZO_ROOT_USER_PASSWORD=complexpass#123 \ openobserve/openobserve:latest


Download
Binaries can be downloaded from the releases page for the appropriate platform.

High Availability(HA) Deployment
If you are looking for a Highly Available installation then head over to HA Deployment section.

items.label: Enterprise
items.title: Enterprise Edition is the recommended version for self-hosted deployments.
items.description: It is free for up to 200 GB of ingestion per day.
items.additionalInfo: For additional volume needs or special requirements, contact our team.

seo.title: OpenObserve Downloads | Start Free Cloud or Self-Hosted Monitoring Today
seo.description: Get started with OpenObserve's generous free tier for cloud and self-hosted installations. Try unlimited features with a 15-day free trial. No credit card required.
